00022 /**
00023  * @file   QuantDabg.cpp
00024  * @author Chuck Sugnet
00025  * @date   Thu Dec 29 17:22:18 2005
00026  * 
00027  * @brief  Class for doing Detected Above BackGround (DABG) analysis. Idea is to
00028  * use the intensity of probes in a probeset to calculate a p-value for the
00029  * entire probeset. The individual intensities are compared to a set of
00030  * background probes.
00031  * 
00032  */
00033 
00034 //
00035 #include "chipstream/QuantDabg.h"
00036 //
00037 #include "portability/affy-base-types.h"
00038 #include "util/Util.h"
00039 #include "util/Verbose.h"
00040 #include "util/md5sum.h"
00041 //
00042 #include <cfloat>
00043 //

00045 using namespace std;
00046 using namespace affx;

00048 /** 
00049  * Set the number of probes and number of chips to be used for estimation.
00050  * @param numProbes - Probe count.
00051  * @param numChips - Microarray count.
00052  */
00053 void QuantDabg::setBounds(unsigned int numProbes, unsigned int numChips) {
00054   unsigned int i = 0;
00055   m_ProbeCount = numProbes;
00056   m_ChipCount = numChips;
00057   /* Check empty case. */
00058   if (m_PM.empty()) {
00059     m_SetPvals.resize(numChips);
00060     m_GcProbeCounts.resize(numProbes);
00061     while (m_PM.size() < numChips) {
00062       m_PM.push_back(vector<double>(numProbes));
00063       m_ProbePvals.push_back(vector<double>(numProbes));
00064     }
00065   }
00066   /* Check number of columns (probes). */
00067   if (numProbes > m_PM[0].size()) {
00068     m_GcProbeCounts.resize(numProbes);
00069     for (i = 0; i < m_PM.size(); i++) {
00070       m_PM[i].resize(numProbes);
00071       m_ProbePvals[i].resize(numProbes);
00072     }
00073   }
00074   /* Check number of rows (chips). */
00075   if (numChips > m_PM.size()) {
00076     m_SetPvals.resize(numChips);
00077 
00078     while (m_PM.size() < numChips) {
00079       m_PM.push_back(vector<double>(m_PM[0].size()));
00080       m_ProbePvals.push_back(vector<double>(m_ProbePvals[0].size()));
00081     }
00082   }
00083 }
00084 
00085 /** 
00086  * Setup the dabg objects with intensity data from background probes. This should
00087  * be called only once.
00088  * 
00089  * @param iMart - Contains data for background probes for each chip.
00090  * @param iTrans - Chipstream transformations for raw data in iMart.
00091  * @param pmAdjust - Adjuster for perfect match probes.
00092  */
00093 void QuantDabg::initializeDabg(const IntensityMart &iMart, 
00094                                std::vector<ChipStream *> &iTrans, 
00095                                PmAdjuster &pmAdjust) {
00096   m_Dabgs.resize(m_ChipCount);
00097   if (m_BgProbes.empty()) {
00098     Err::errAbort("QuantDabg::initializeDabg() - Must specify at least some probes for background distribution.");
00099   }
00100 
00101   /* load up the dabg objects for each chip with background data. */
00102   for (unsigned int chipIx = 0; chipIx < m_ChipCount; chipIx++) {
00103     Dabg &dabg = m_Dabgs[chipIx];
00104     dabg.intensity_reserve(m_BgProbes.size());
00105         dabg.GCCN_preprocessed (m_GCCN_preprocessed);
00106     for (unsigned int probeIx = 0; probeIx < m_BgProbes.size(); probeIx++) {
00107       int id = m_BgProbes[probeIx];
00108       float intensity = transformPrimaryData(id, chipIx, iMart, iTrans);
00109       assert(id < m_ProbeGcVec.size());
00110       if (m_ProbeGcVec[id] == (char)NULLPROBEGC) {
00111         Err::errAbort("QuantDabg - Need probe index: " + ToStr(id) + " GC count for background, but wasn't loaded.");
00112       }
00113       dabg.add_intensity(m_ProbeGcVec[id], intensity);
00114     }
00115     dabg.prepare();
00116   }
00117   m_DabgInit = true;
00118 }
00119 
00120 /** 
00121  * @brief Set up the quantification method given all the data about the probe
00122  * set, chip and data.
00123  * 
00124  * @param psGroup - Probes to be used for final estimate.
00125  * @param iMart - Raw data from chips.
00126  * @param iTrans - Transformations to be applied to data before use.
00127  * @param pmAdjust - How to estimate background, or MM probe.
00128  * @return bool - True if setup sucessful, false otherwise.
00129  */
00130 bool QuantDabg::setUp(ProbeSetGroup &psGroup, const IntensityMart &iMart, 
00131                       std::vector<ChipStream *> &iTrans, PmAdjuster &pmAdjust) {
00132   unsigned int chipIx = 0, probeIx = 0, psIx, atomIx = 0;
00133   unsigned int chipCount = 0, atomPmCount = 0;
00134   double intensity = 0.0;
00135   assert(psGroup.probeSets.size() > 0);
00136 
00137   chipCount = iMart.getCelFileCount();
00138   atomPmCount = psGroup.countPmProbes();
00139   if (atomPmCount == 0)
00140     return false;
00141   /* Prepare the quantification method for this many atoms and chips. */
00142   setBounds(atomPmCount, chipCount);
00143   if (!m_DabgInit) {
00144     initializeDabg(iMart, iTrans, pmAdjust);
00145   }
00146   atomPmCount = 0;
00147   m_Probes.clear();
00148   m_GcProbeCounts.clear();
00149   /* Loop through and fill in the data as coming from the intensity mart. */
00150   for (psIx = 0; psIx < psGroup.probeSets.size(); psIx++) {
00151     const ProbeSet *ps = psGroup.probeSets[psIx];
00152     if (ps == NULL)
00153       continue;
00154     for (atomIx = 0; atomIx < ps->atoms.size(); atomIx++) {
00155       Atom &atom = *(ps->atoms[atomIx]);
00156       unsigned int channelIx = atom.getChannelCode();
00157       for (probeIx = 0; probeIx < atom.probes.size(); probeIx++) {
00158         Probe *p = atom.probes[probeIx];
00159         if (p->type == Probe::PMST || p->type == Probe::PMAT) {
00160           unsigned int probeIndex = p->id;
00161           int gcCount = m_ProbeGcVec[probeIndex];
00162           if (gcCount == NULLPROBEGC) {
00163             Err::errAbort("Unable to figure out GC count for probe with id: " + ToStr(probeIndex + 1));
00164           }
00165           //if (m_Dabgs[0].intensity_count(gcCount)==0) {
00166           //  std::string errorMessage = "No background probes found for GC bin " + ToStr(gcCount) + " for probe with id: " + ToStr(probeIndex + 1);
00167           //  if (m_BgpFile != "") {
00168           //    errorMessage.append("\nPerhaps there is no probe with GC count " + ToStr(gcCount) + " in bgp-file: " + m_BgpFile);
00169           //  }       
00170           //  Err::errAbort(errorMessage);
00171           //}
00172           m_GcProbeCounts.push_back(gcCount);
00173           m_Probes.push_back(p);
00174           for (chipIx = 0; chipIx < chipCount; chipIx++) {
00175             /* PM transformation. */
00176             intensity = transformPrimaryData(probeIndex, chipIx, iMart, iTrans, channelIx);
00177             ///@todo use channel to set correct pmdata
00178             setPMDataAt(atomPmCount, chipIx, intensity);
00179           }
00180           atomPmCount++;
00181         }
00182       }
00183     } /* atoms. */
00184   } /* probe sets. */
00185   return true;
00186 }

00189 /** 
00190  * Which probes should be used as the background distribution.
00191  * @param bgProbes - vector of probes to be used, memory 
00192  * owned elsewhere.
00193  */
00194 void QuantDabg::setBgProbes(const std::vector<int> &bgProbes) {
00195   m_BgProbes = bgProbes;
00196   vector<int>::iterator probeIx;
00197   md5sum md5;
00198   for (probeIx = m_BgProbes.begin(); probeIx != m_BgProbes.end(); ++probeIx) {
00199     md5.update_nbo((*probeIx));
00200   }
00201   md5.final(m_ProbeMd5Sum);
00202   setOptValue("subsetmd5", m_ProbeMd5Sum);
00203 }
00204 
00205 /** 
00206  * Which probes should be used as the background distribution.
00207  * @param bgProbes - vector of probes to be used, memory 
00208  * owned elsewhere.
00209  */
00210 void QuantDabg::setBgProbes(const std::vector<Probe *> &bgProbes) {
00211   m_BgProbes.reserve(bgProbes.size());
00212   int probeIx = 0;
00213   md5sum md5;
00214   for (probeIx = 0; probeIx < bgProbes.size(); ++probeIx) {
00215     md5.update_nbo(bgProbes[probeIx]->id);
00216     m_BgProbes.push_back(bgProbes[probeIx]->id);
00217   }
00218   md5.final(m_ProbeMd5Sum);
00219   setOptValue("subsetmd5", m_ProbeMd5Sum);
00220 }
00221 
00222 /** 
00223  * Return the -1 * log_10(val). Val is capped at DBL_MIN to avoid taking lots of values <= 0. 
00224  * @param val - Regular p-value.
00225  * @return -1 * log_10(val)
00226  */
00227 double QuantDabg::negLog10Prob(double val) {
00228   val = Max(val, DBL_MIN);
00229   return -1 * log(val)/log(10.0);
00230 }
00231 
00232 void QuantDabg::computeEstimate() {
00233   for (unsigned int chipIx = 0; chipIx < m_ChipCount; chipIx++) {
00234     double setPvalue = 0;
00235     Dabg &dabg = m_Dabgs[chipIx];
00236     if (m_DoFisher) {
00237       dabg.compute_target_fisher(m_ProbeCount, &m_GcProbeCounts[0], 
00238                                  &m_PM[chipIx][0], m_Adjustment, &setPvalue,
00239                                  &m_ProbePvals[chipIx][0]);
00240     }
00241     else if (m_DoPercentile) {
00242       dabg.compute_target_percentile(m_ProbeCount, &m_GcProbeCounts[0], 
00243                                  &m_PM[chipIx][0], m_PercentileEst,
00244                                                                  &setPvalue, &m_ProbePvals[chipIx][0], m_GCCN_preprocessed);
00245     }
00246     else {
00247       Err::errAbort("QuantDabg::computeEstimate() - Must set m_DoPercentile or m_DoFisher.");
00248     }
00249     if (m_ReportLog) {
00250       setPvalue = negLog10Prob(setPvalue);
00251       for (unsigned int probeIx = 0; probeIx < m_ProbeCount; probeIx++) {
00252         m_ProbePvals[chipIx][probeIx] = negLog10Prob(m_ProbePvals[chipIx][probeIx]);
00253       }
00254     }
00255     m_SetPvals[chipIx] = setPvalue;
00256   }
00257 }

00259 /** 
00260  * @brief This static function should be overridden by child classes
00261  * to return an object of the correct type initialized correctly
00262  * with the parameters in the string, string map. All objects
00263  * created this way should be deleted when finished using.
00264  * 
00265  * @param param - Map of key/value pairs to initialize the object.
00266  * 
00267  * @return Pointer toCreate object, this should be sub casted as necessary.
00268  */
00269 SelfCreate *QuantDabg::newObject(std::map<std::string,std::string> &param) {
00270   SelfDoc doc = explainSelf();
00271   bool doFisher = true, doPercentile = false, reportLog = false;
00272   int adjustment= 0;
00273   double percentile = .75;
00274   bool GCCN_preprocessed = false;
00275   fillInValue(doFisher, "chisq", param, doc);
00276   fillInValue(percentile, "percentile", param, doc);
00277   fillInValue(doPercentile, "usepercentile", param, doc);
00278   fillInValue(reportLog, "neglog10", param, doc);
00279   fillInValue(adjustment, "adjust-dof", param, doc);
00280   if (doPercentile) 
00281     doFisher = false;
00282   else if (doFisher) 
00283     doPercentile = false;
00284   QuantDabg *dabg = new QuantDabg(doFisher, doPercentile, percentile, reportLog, adjustment);
00285   return dabg;
00286 }
